footer.text: Character Guide • Playstyle: Shenhe | Update Date: 08/05/2022 | Editor: Effab1e#2963

description:
Shenhe is a cryo unit with an complex kit that has strong buffing capabilites and the ability to increase the dmg dealt by cryo units. She is generally played as the second cryo in Freeze comps and is currently the best enabler for a "mono Cryo" team due to her Cryo focused buffing and decent praticle generation. Shenhe is also viable in Physical and Melt comps.

**Kit Breakdown**
Her Burst shreds Cryo & Physical Resistance, gives a Cryo damage buff to the on field unit and deals periodic Cryo damage. It is her main way of proccing Quills. It is the majority of her damage share and has good buffing so it is worth building enough Energy Recharge to burst consistently even at the cost of ATK.

Her Skill generates [5-7] Quills that buff instances of Cryo damage dealt by each member of the team based on her total ATK and are counted separately per member. It also gives a [Skill+Burst or Normal+Charged Attack] damage buff. 

Both these abilities let her bring a lot to the table for compositions with Cryo team members.

[*] - Depends on if skill is tapped or held. 
For an in depth breakdown of her usage check out the KQM guide linked below.
